name: Maple Ave
description: A well-maintained stretch of Maple Avenue, a bastion of suburban pride. You are on Maple Ave. The street is well-maintained, with manicured lawns and vibrant flowerbeds that stubbornly resist the encroaching weariness of the neighborhood. Maple Ave continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
